Module slogo_team01
Package view.statepane

Class BasicSingleTurtleState

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.statepane.BasicSingleTurtleState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SingleTurtleState
    public class BasicSingleTurtleState
extends java.lang.Object
implements SingleTurtleState
    Class which implements SingleTurtleState and so is able to store and dynamically update stored state of a turtle, and display this stored state in a graphcial view. Also able to allow user to dynamically modify stored state and inform the StateObserver whenever the stored state is modified by the user, using a simplified observer pattern. Uses reflection to initialise each possible state field, store its name, its graphical position and its event handler when modified.
    Author:
    Goh Khian Wei
